• from_package
  • from_traversable_resources
  • fallback_resources
  • _tempfile
  • as_file
  • _
   1 from __future__ import absolute_import
   2 
   3 import os
   4 import tempfile
   5 import contextlib
   6 
   7 from ._compat import (
   8     Path, package_spec, FileNotFoundError, ZipPath,
   9     singledispatch, suppress,
  10     )
  11 
  12 
  13 def from_package(package):
  14     """
  15     Return a Traversable object for the given package.
  16 
  17     """
  18     spec = package_spec(package)
  19     return from_traversable_resources(spec) or fallback_resources(spec)
  20 
  21 
  22 def from_traversable_resources(spec):
  23     """
  24     If the spec.loader implements TraversableResources,
  25     directly or implicitly, it will have a ``files()`` method.
  26     """
  27     with suppress(AttributeError):
  28         return spec.loader.files()
  29 
  30 
  31 def fallback_resources(spec):
  32     package_directory = Path(spec.origin).parent
  33     try:
  34         archive_path = spec.loader.archive
  35         rel_path = package_directory.relative_to(archive_path)
  36         return ZipPath(archive_path, str(rel_path) + '/')
  37     except Exception:
  38         pass
  39     return package_directory
  40 
  41 
  42 @contextlib.contextmanager
  43 def _tempfile(reader, suffix=''):
  44     # Not using tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile as it leads to deeper 'try'
  45     # blocks due to the need to close the temporary file to work on Windows
  46     # properly.
  47     fd, raw_path = tempfile.mkstemp(suffix=suffix)
  48     try:
  49         os.write(fd, reader())
  50         os.close(fd)
  51         yield Path(raw_path)
  52     finally:
  53         try:
  54             os.remove(raw_path)
  55         except FileNotFoundError:
  56             pass
  57 
  58 
  59 @singledispatch
  60 @contextlib.contextmanager
  61 def as_file(path):
  62     """
  63     Given a Traversable object, return that object as a
  64     path on the local file system in a context manager.
  65     """
  66     with _tempfile(path.read_bytes, suffix=path.name) as local:
  67         yield local
  68 
  69 
  70 @as_file.register(Path)
  71 @contextlib.contextmanager
  72 def _(path):
  73     """
  74     Degenerate behavior for pathlib.Path objects.
  75     """
  76     yield path
